title: Can I Keep Using My Credit Card? (Hour 2)
description:
Take our Audience Survey & Enter to Win a $500 Visa Gift Card: Click here to take the survey

Dr. John Delony & George Kamel discuss:

Paying off the house or investing,

Selling the house vs. renovating it,

529 questions,

Using a credit card to build credit,

Why you shouldn't combine finances with your boyfriend.
